ygData.messageBody:
Yep, and MOBs of similar types who are in range of each other "share" their
list. Of course, all MOBs in Unrest do share (thus the non agro beetles
attacking to support undeads).
What happened is that the hag came in range of your target and saw you
(well, you the original sender) so high on the list that she prefered to get
you instead of that paladin, well, that's my guess.

Thormael
